heroDescription: Seeking pre-professional internship opportunities and first junior job in software development, systems, and infrastructure.
profileText1: 8th semester Systems and Computing Engineering student with solid technical training. Despite lacking formal work experience, I compensate through academic and personal projects that demonstrate my technical skills.
profileText2: My focus is on software development (backend/frontend/full stack), systems, infrastructure, and networks. I seek to contribute with enthusiasm and learning ability in a professional environment.
focus: Focus on software development and systems
project1Desc: Complete system for student, course, and grade management with Java Swing graphical interface.
project2Desc: Modern online store with shopping cart, authentication, and admin panel.
project3Desc: RESTful API for user management with JWT authentication, Swagger documentation, and tests.
project4Desc: Completely responsive personal website with light/dark mode and internationalization.
contactDescription: I'm interested in internship and first job opportunities. Feel free to contact me!
footerTagline: Systems Engineering student seeking professional opportunities
footerNote: Responsive web CV with light/dark mode and internationalization
